title: LEGO Star Wars: Skywalker Saga Reviews, Monkey Island Returns - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.04.22
description:
Go to http://chime.com/kfgames to get started with Chime.

Get 25% off and zero delivery fees on their first order of $15 or more, when you download the DoorDash app and enter code KINDAFUNNY.

Go to http://babbel.com/kindafunny to get up to 60% off your subscription.

Blessing and Tim unite for a fun Monday of news! Let's talk about Lego Star Wars, Return to Monkey Island, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
Over on Tik Tok: Roger has a review of Lego Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga. We’ll talk about that more in the show.
Over on youtube: There’s a new episode of the Kinda Funny Xcast. That’s Mike, Parris, and Gary talking about Weird West, MLB The Show and what the new PS Plus means for Xbox. You can catch that right now on Youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
We also have Morbius in Review now up on Youtube.com/kindafunny and on the In Review podcast feed.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady,  Pranksy, & Anonymous
The Roper Report   -
00:07:45 - Lego Star Wars review round up
00:15:00 - Return to Monkey Island announced - Sal Romano @ Gematsu
00:32:45 -  Ad
00:35:36 - The PS Plus hack that PlayStation doesn’t want you to know… or do they?? - Robert Anderson @ IGN
00:37:12 - Could we get PS3 emulation after all? - Zarmena Khan @ PlayStation Lifestyle
00:45:56 - There’s a new Elden Ring Patch - Joe Skrebels @ IG
00:49:15 - A 2001 Demo for Gex Jr. has leaked online - Zack Zweizen @ Kotaku
00:57:36 - Out today
00:58:32 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Gary

let's start off with metacritic right right now i'm meditating starting is sitting at an 85 on open critic it is sitting at an 84. tristan ogilvy over at ign gave it an 8 out of 10 and says lego star wars the skywars saga provides some rollicking reimaginings of star wars most iconic moments and sees them inside a series of interplanetary playgrounds that are dense with discovery and entertaining diversions certain elements like its upgrade and cover systems feel somewhat superfluous and co-op has some notable drawbacks but there are otherwise enough laugh out loud gags and surprising shifts in gameplay to keep me thoroughly engaged from the opening crawl of episode 1 all the way through to the end of episode 9 which is more than i can say for the actual movies and then andrew reiner over at gaming forward gave it an 8 out of 10 and said despite being periodically uneventful the skywarker saga is a thorough and fun examination of all three star wars movie trilogies it delivers the

at gaming forward gave it an 8 out of 10 and said despite being periodically uneventful the skywarker saga is a thorough and fun examination of all three star wars movie trilogies it delivers the same sensation of being overwhelmed as opening a blu-ray collection of films and not knowing which one you should start with the player can bounce between trilogies and veer off a story path at any time to explore the galaxy far far away some discoveries may be as dull as sand but others may deliver something great like bobby freak as a playable character or seeing what kylo ren's bedroom looks like and then roger i kind of funny called it great kevin you can go ahead and play the tick tock is it playing is it is that no you gotta give me a second sorry i'm all right no worries i wouldn't i saw the monitor it was like a black screen i don't know where's the skywalker saga is pretty great i grew up with the original games and they're probably the reason why i love this franchise so much the
